title: Noam Chomsky on the Legacy of JFK
description:
Green and Red co-host Bob Buzzanco talks with Noam Chomsky about the legacy of JFK. 
Part of a bigger interview on Oliver Stone's "JFK Revisited," the war in Vietnam, Jan 6, politics in America. 
Found on all your podcast audio listening platforms, our YouTube channel and our Facebook video page.
